thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | www.flashbay.com
thread.title: LJD

author: LJD
title: LJD
text:
This was the easiest and quickest turnaround I've ever experienced in all my years dealing with vendors. Jill was professional, quick to respond, did what she said she would do in record time, knowledgeable, and friendly. She mad the process so easy! We are thrilled with our flash drives that will be used mainly for marketing purposes.
It's wonderful to work with a company located in the USA, who manufacture their own products here in the USA!
Thank you Flashbay!
L. Dunlap
